sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>paragraph</radical> radical and the <kanji>paragraph</kanji> kanji are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: You have to write an entire <kanji>paragraph</kanji> about a topic, so you choose <reading>coo</reading>kies (<ja>く</ja>).
readingInfo: Imagine actually getting an assignment to write a paragraph all about cookies. Would you write about your favorite cookies? Your eating methods?
